Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; TRAILING BY POINTIL
Name: Ornamentation elements
Description: Two necklace fragments, one made of small single and double rounded beads of a blue colour, the other made of yellow cylinder-shaped beads. The former have a size that varies from 2,5 to 5 mm, the latter a length of 4mm for a thickness of 3 mm.
